definition: chess/chess-like game/a game of chess/CL:盤|盘[pan2]/chess piece/CL:個|个[ge4],顆|颗[ke1]

sentences.english: In the chess game, he advanced his pawn forward two spaces.
sentences.chinese: 下國際象棋時，他讓兵前進了兩格。

sentences.english: O The chess control balance helps to detect the errors that do not influence equalities .
sentences.chinese: 國際象棋控制的平衡，有助於偵測錯誤，不影響等式。

sentences.english: My win at chess raised my spirits a little.
sentences.chinese: 我贏了這盤國際象棋纔打起了一點精神。

sentences.english: Chess, for example, began in India before the sixth century.
sentences.chinese: 例如，國際象棋最早起源與六世紀前的印度。

sentences.english: On display is one of the earliest surviving chess sets, made by hand from a type of pottery in Iran in the 12th century.
sentences.chinese: 展出的則是十二世紀伊朗陶製的國際象棋棋盤。

sentences.english: This minimax logic can also be extended to games like chess .
sentences.chinese: 極大極小邏輯也被用於其它博弈，比如國際象棋中。

sentences.english: This is the chess that made of White chocolate and Drak chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 這是黑色和白色巧克力製成的國際象棋。

sentences.english: The boys played a drawn game of chess.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們下了一盤國際象棋，不分勝負。

sentences.english: Do you know all the possible moves in chess?
sentences.chinese: 國際象棋的各種走法你都會嗎。

sentences.english: You are the chess queen dujour.
One of my all-time fave strips from xkcd is Chess Photo.
sentences.chinese: 從xkcd上，我最癡迷的便是國際象棋照片。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The exciting action of a basketball game makes it much more telegenic than a game of chess.
sentences.chinese: 籃球比賽場面激烈，遠比國際象棋適合電視轉播。

sentences.english: I played my niece at chess and she gave me a right hammering.
sentences.chinese: 我同我侄女下國際象棋時，她把我打得落花流水。

sentences.english: The black-colored pieces, as in chess or checkers.
sentences.chinese: 國際象棋或西洋跳棋中的黑色棋子。

sentences.english: Andthis reminds me of the difference between chess and the Chinese game of go.
sentences.chinese: 這使我想起了國際象棋和中國圍棋的區別。

sentences.english: The China University Students Chess Contest was also held at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 中國大學生國際象棋賽也於同日舉行。

definition: cheerleading squad/also written 啦啦隊|啦啦队
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
